description
======================
Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa is the second edition of the arcade game , based on the story of DreamWorks animated film . Production team Papaya Studio predecessor model allows us to meet with remarkable , African menagerie , which includes among others, Marty the zebra , Melman the giraffe , Alex the lion , Gloria the Hippo nice and came from afar penguins.

As befits a typical platformer , the game offers us a series of missions , during which in turn controls the pierwszoplanowymi heroes and watching them from behind , trying to pass successfully through a series of challenges prepared by the authors of the product . Following the actions of Alex , we can jump over rocks and fight even at a distance and with hyenas and crocodiles . Playing as Melman , is given to us in turn safely fall from great heights , turning in circles like a helicopter propeller . Input in the form of Marty allows you to make use of horses' hooves , and the use of the unique capabilities of Gloria to navigate under water and explore the local caves. The study of these locations is especially important because in the depths of the mussels were hidden , hiding in a priceless pearl - it's thanks to them seamlessly move to the next stage of the game.

Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa has also participated in a car chase before fleeing jeep truck and helicopter landing action in the heart of the savannah. Therefore , the game draws handfuls from the movie of the same name , it's easy to find there a lot of references to the cinematic image. Accents straight from the silver screen manifest themselves in colorful graphics and humorous animated interludes that we see between missions .
